name: Standard Margin Amount
description: amount of the added markup on the given product, project, or service, for the quantity of units sold in the given transaction (in other words, the profit earned by Rockwell Automation after deducting all costs associated with the transaction), stored as a decimal in the currency specified by the COPA Record Currency Code
Standard Margin Amount = Total Revenue - Total Cost Of Sales

annotations.name: Format
annotations.value: <Format Format="Currency"><Currency LCID="1033" DisplayName="" Symbol="" PositivePattern="0" NegativePattern="0" /></Format>
